Key Match Events: Lautaro Martinez struck twice in the second half to help Argentina's second string beat Peru 2-0 at the Copa América on Saturday and finish top of Group A, knocking Peru out of the tournament.
Sergio Peña (Peru) is shown the yellow card in the 90'+4' minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina had 74.3% possession compared to Peru's 25.7%.
The match was held at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida, USA, with an attendance of 64,972.
